article.title: MAC Address Spoofing
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Wi-Fi network know who you are by looking at your MAC address. But what if we can manipulate this identity?

authors.bio: Hey, I'm Tom. I'm exploring software and hardware and documenting the process!
authors.name: Tom Rodrigues

next.title: Wi-Fi Cracking
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: We use Wi-Fi every day for everything from keeping in touch with friends and family to online banking. But how safe are we when we use Wi-Fi?

next.title: My DIY Smart Thermostat
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: Controlling your home's temperature has never been easier with smart thermostats, but what if you could make one yourself and save money?
